title: "Captain America" stars cheer on the Atlanta Hawks
title_page: "Captain America" stars cheer on the Atlanta Hawks
text:
"Captain America: Civil War" is filming in Atlanta and a number of the stars were on the Atlanta Hawks guest list for Wednesday night's game, a thrilling 82-81 triumph over the Wizards.
Chris Evans, Scarlett Johansson, Robert Downey Jr. , Anthony Mackie, Daniel Bruhl and Sebastian Stan all were on the list of VIP guests scheduled to take in the game from the privacy of an exclusive suite.
UPDATES:
Photos from the Buckhead "Captain America" set
Photos from the Midtown "Captain America" set
Chris Evans spotted toning his "monster" physique at Atlanta gym
Scarlett Johansson, Chris Evans spotted in Buckhead
"Captain America: Civil War" films in downtown Atlanta
Getty Images
A colleague spotted Mackie and a fan tweeted that Scarlett "bought an Al Horford jersey" but I'm still tracking down who all else was there.
More later!
